name: Khatyrka: Prelude
storyline: The humble people of Khatyrka Steppe find their peaceful way of life under threat. Gadzhi, a military defector, is on the run. Tricked by the people of Khatyrka Village into helping them, Gadzhi must reclaim his stolen military cargo before his past catches up to him.
summary: Khatyrka: Prelude is a narrative third-person shooter that follows the story of Gadzhi, a military defector who must cross the vast and hostile Khatyrka Steppe in escape of his former comrades. Explore the vast, arid steppe on horseback and survive intense combat encounters.
